doc.field: The Sabbateni Collection of Renaissance Music Manuscripts
The Sabbateni Collection of Renaissance Music Manuscripts

Nine editions, bound together (1): Lassus: Cantiones Sacrae à6 (München: Heinrich, 1601) RISM 16013 (2): Reiner: LIber Mottetarum à6,8 (München: Heinrich, 1600) RISM R1086 (3): Agricola, J.: Motetae novae à4-8 (Nürnberg: Agricola, 1601) RISM A432 (4): Demantius: Trias Precum Vesperinarum à4-6 (Nürnberg: Agricola, [1602]) RISM D1533 (5): Franck, M.: I Sacrarum Melodiarum à4-8 (Augsburg: Schönigk, 1601) RISM F1641 (6): Hassler, J.: Madrigali à6 (Nürnberg: Kaufmann, 1600) RISM H2345 (7): Aichinger: Liber Sacrarum Cantionum à5-8 (Nürnberg: Kauffmann, 1597) RISM A519 (8): Hausmann: Manipulus Sacrarum Cantionum à5-6 (Nürnberg: Kauffmann, 1602) RISM H2377 (9): Aichinger: Odaria Lectissima à3-4 (Augsburg: Willer (Praetorius), 1601) RISM A5244 Three part-books, Camtus, Altus and Tenor, from a set of at least six, probably eight
The Sabbateni Collection of Renaissance Music Manuscripts
